info-head-1: Kūkulu ʻia ma luna o ka paepae hCaptcha i hōʻoia ʻia
info-text-1: Holo ka hCaptcha Enterprise ma ka ʻenehana platform hCaptcha, hoʻonui ʻia e hoʻokomo i nā hiʻohiʻona e pono ai nā ʻoihana kiʻekiʻe.

info-text-2: Ua hilinaʻi ʻia kā mākou lawelawe e nā hui nui loa o ka honua e lawelawe i nā miliona o nā mea hoʻohana i kēlā me kēia lā ma waena o nā ʻumi miliona o nā pūnaewele.
cloudflare-quote-text: Ua loiloi mākou i kekahi mau mea kūʻai aku CAPTCHA a me ke kūkulu ʻana i kahi ʻōnaehana iā mākou iho. I ka hopena, ua puka mai ka hCaptcha ma ke ʻano he koho maikaʻi loa i reCAPTCHA.
section-quote-head: ʻO ke koho kūpono no nā ʻoihana kalepa kiʻekiʻe
section-quote-text: ʻO ka mea hope loa, kahi koho kūpono i Google. Hāʻawi ʻo hCaptcha Enterprise i ka mālama kālā nui ma kāu bila reCAPTCHA me ka palekana kiʻekiʻe: a hiki i ka 80% emi ke kumu kūʻai ma kekahi mau hihia. Ua hoʻololi ka nui o nā lawelawe pūnaewele nui loa o ka honua iā hCaptcha Enterprise a loaʻa iā ia ka ʻike bot i hoʻomaikaʻi ʻia me ka mālama kālā nui.
section-quote-button: E kelepona mai iā mākou i kēia lā no kahi ʻōlelo
section-privacy-text-1: ʻIke nā pūnaewele hoʻolaha i kāu mau malihini ma ke ʻano he huahana. No mākou wale nō ka huahana e hoʻoholo i ko lākou kanaka. Hoʻokō a ʻoi aku paha kā mākou mau lawelawe i nā koi GDPR, CCPA, a me LGPD, a kākoʻo i nā hana e like me Privacy Pass. Ke hana ikaika nei mākou e kaulike i ka pilikino a me ka palekana.
section-privacy-text-2: ʻO kēia manaʻo kūʻokoʻa i ka pilikino, ʻo ia ka mea hiki iā mākou ke hāʻawi i ka paʻa ʻana o ka ʻikepili pākahi, hana ʻole kuki, a me nā hōʻoia pilikino ʻē aʻe e like me ke koi ʻana me ka mālama ʻana i ka palekana maikaʻi loa.
section-security-text-1: Aia ka pololei i kou hoihoi a me kā mākou. Hana ʻo hCaptcha e hāʻawi iā ʻoe i ka ʻikepili maoli a e ʻae iā ʻoe e hoʻoholo pehea e hoʻohana ai. Hāʻawi ʻia nā captchas e nā hui hoʻolaha Gigantic. ʻO kēia ke ʻano o kēlā me kēia bot a lākou e poloka ai e hōʻemi i kā lākou loaʻa kālā.
section-security-text-2: ʻO ka hoʻohana ʻana i nā ʻenehana aʻo mīkini hou me ka nānā ʻana i ka pilikino e hiki iā mākou ke ʻoi aku ma mua o nā kūlana palekana o ka hoʻoilina hoʻopaʻa moʻolelo i nā hoʻolālā mau loa me ka ʻole e hōʻino i ka palekana a i ʻole ka pilikino mea hoʻohana.
section-user-experience-text1: No nā mea hoʻohana Enterprise, loaʻa nā koho e pale loa i nā pilikia i ka hapa nui o nā hiʻohiʻona.
section-user-experience-text2: E hōʻemi i ka hakakā ma ka pale ʻana i kahi paʻakikī no 99.9% o kāu kaʻa kūpono ʻoiai e hāʻawi ana i ka palekana maikaʻi loa, mahalo i nā hiʻohiʻona bot holomua.
section-easy-integration-text: ʻO ka hoʻohui ʻana i ka hCaptcha he mau minuke wale nō a he mau laina liʻiliʻi wale nō. Ua kūpono ka API kumu me reCAPTCHA V2, a he mau minuke wale nō ke hoʻololi. Hiki iā ʻoe ke kū a holo me kahi koho ʻoi aku ka maikaʻi i kēia lā, a hoʻohuli i nā hiʻohiʻona ʻoi aʻe e like me ka mea e pono ai.
section-threat-text: ʻAʻole like nā pilikia a pau: ʻo ka loaʻa ʻana o ka helu hoʻokahi pono ia e hoʻoponopono i kāu mau pono e pono ai. Me kā hCaptcha's Customized Threat Scores, hiki i ke kūkākūkā wikiwiki ke hoʻoponopono i kā mākou mau hiʻohiʻona e hāʻawi i nā helu pili i kāu ʻoihana.

Hiki i kēia ke hōʻemi nui i nā kumukūʻai a me nā kaʻa ma waho o ka pūnaewele ʻoiai e mālama ana i nā pono āpau o ka hoʻokele e kā mākou limahana kelepona 24/7 e hālāwai me nā SLA koʻikoʻi.

Mālama mākou i ke kākoʻo kelepona 24/7 a hāʻawi i ka hoʻonohonoho pono ʻana iā Slack me kāu hui hoʻohui ʻenehana a me kā mākou limahana kelepona i ka wā a ma hope o ka hoʻokō ʻana. , a me kā mākou pūnaewele kākoʻo i-widget a me ka leka uila. intro-subtitle-p1-privacy: ʻO kahi ʻano pilikino i alakaʻi ʻia i ka palekana pūnaewele.
info-head-2-pr: ʻO ka hoʻopaʻa ʻana i ka hana ma ka pūnaewele ʻaʻole ia ka pane.
info-text-1-pr: Hoʻokahi wale nō kumu o ka hCaptcha Enterprise: e pale aku i nā mea hana ʻino mai ka hoʻopilikia ʻana i kāu mau hana pūnaewele a me ka hōʻino ʻana i kāu mea hoʻohana.
info-text-2-pr: Hoʻolālā ʻia kā mākou mau ʻōnaehana mai ka honua e hōʻemi i ka hōʻiliʻili ʻana a me ka mālama ʻana i ka mālama ʻana i ka palekana alakaʻi papa. ʻO ke ala maikaʻi loa e pale ai i ka ʻikepili mea hoʻohana ʻaʻole ia e mālama iki.
info-text-3-pr: Hoʻomalu pū ʻia nā pilina mea kūʻai aku e kahi Kuʻikahi Hoʻoponopono ʻIkepili ikaika. Hoʻokō ka lawelawe hCaptcha i nā kānāwai pilikino a pau ma kahi e noho ai kāu lawelawe a i ʻole kāu mea kūʻai aku. ʻO ka mālama ʻole ʻana i ka ʻikepili pilikino e maʻalahi kēia no mākou ma mua o nā hui ʻē aʻe.
info-text-2-2-pr: ʻO nā lawelawe e like me reCAPTCHA v3 e ʻōlelo ʻo ka hoʻokomo ʻana i kā lākou pixel tracking ma kēlā me kēia ʻaoʻao o kāu pūnaewele pono no ka palekana maikaʻi. ʻAʻole kēia ka hihia.
info-text-2-3-pr: He hōʻailona maʻalahi ka nānā ʻana i ka ʻano hana maʻalahi e nā mea hana ʻino, a pono e hoʻopaʻa i ka mōʻaukala mākaʻikaʻi no kāu mau huakaʻi kūpono.
info-text-2-4-pr: ʻAʻole mākou hana i kahi pūnaewele hoʻolaha, a ʻaʻohe makemake i ka nānā ʻana i kāu ʻano mea hoʻohana e kūʻai aku iā lākou i nā hoʻolaha. ʻO ia ke ʻano, ʻaʻole mākou e koi i kahi pika passive ma kēlā me kēia ʻaoʻao o kāu pūnaewele.
info-text-2-5-pr: Hoʻohui i kā mākou code hoʻokūkū wale nō ma kahi e pono ai, a ma kahi kūpono e pale aku ai iā ʻoe a me kāu mea hoʻohana.
info-head-3-pr: He mea pono ke aʻo mīkini. Akā ʻaʻole ia e koi i ka ʻikepili pilikino e hana.
info-text-3-1-pr: Hoʻopili ke aʻo ʻana i nā mīkini i nā ʻano āpau o ko mākou ola, pinepine i nā ala a mākou i ʻike ʻole ai a ʻike ʻole. ʻAʻole ʻokoʻa nā lawelawe palekana pūnaewele.
info-text-3-2-pr: Ma ke aʻo ʻana ma luna o nā tausani o nā hōʻailona, hiki i nā mea hoʻohālike ke hoʻomaopopo a hiki i ka hilinaʻi kiʻekiʻe i ka ʻike ʻana i ka hana ʻino me ka wikiwiki, ʻoiai inā ʻaʻohe hōʻailona hoʻokahi i lawa ka ikaika e hōʻike i kahi pilikia.
info-text-3-3-pr: Eia nō naʻe, ʻaʻohe o kēia e koi i ka hoʻohana ʻana i ka ʻike pilikino pilikino (PII). ʻAe nā ʻenehana cryptographic hou iā mākou e hoʻolei i nā ʻikepili pilikino i ka hikiwawe, e hana ana i nā pūlima ala hoʻokahi ʻaʻole hiki ke hoʻopili ʻia i kekahi kanaka.
info-text-3-4-pr: Hoʻohana maikaʻi ʻia ka hoʻomaʻamaʻa ʻana i ka ʻikepili de-identified, ʻaʻole pono e hoʻololi i ka palekana a i ʻole ka pilikino. Ua hana kā mākou mea kūʻai i nā hoʻokolohua empirical, a ua haʻi mai iā mākou ua like a ʻoi aku ka maikaʻi ma mua o nā koho pilikino liʻiliʻi.
cloudflare-quote-text-privacy: Ua makemake mākou i kekahi mau mea e pili ana i ka hCaptcha solutions: 1) ʻaʻole lākou e kūʻai aku i ka ʻikepili pilikino; ʻohi lākou i ka ʻikepili pilikino pono liʻiliʻi wale nō, maopopo lākou i ka wehewehe ʻana i ka ʻike a lākou e hōʻiliʻili ai a me ke ʻano o ka hoʻohana ʻana a/a i ʻole ka hōʻike ʻana.
pilot-head: E ho'āʻo mai iā mākou ma kou ʻāina me ke kuleana ʻole.
pilot-text-1a: He poʻe ʻenekinia mākou, ʻaʻole he poʻe kūʻai aku: makemake mākou e hauʻoli ʻoe i kāu koho.
pilot-text-1b: ʻO ke ala maikaʻi loa e hōʻoia i kou ʻoluʻolu ʻo ka hōʻike ʻana e hoʻokō mākou i kāu mau pono.
pilot-text-1c: Ma kahi o nā hui a pau e hoʻomaka ana i kahi pailaka e koho i kā mākou hopena.
pilot-text-1d: E hoʻohana i kēia palapala e hiki ai i kekahi o kā mākou loea loea. Pane koke mākou.
pilot-text-1e: Hiki iā ʻoe ke leka uila pololei iā mākou.
pilot-f5: ʻO nā kikoʻī ʻē aʻe e loaʻa iā mākou?
pilot-f6: Makemake ʻoe i ka hoʻouka koke ʻana?
pilot-f8: Aia au ma lalo o ka hoʻouka ʻia a koi aku i ka hoʻouka koke ʻana.
pilot-f10: Ma ke komo ʻana i kāu leka uila, ua ʻae ʻoe i kā mākou Kūlana a me nā Kulekele pilikino, a e loaʻa i ka leka uila mai iā mākou.
pilot-fo-1: ʻAʻole hiki ke maʻalahi ka hoʻohui ʻana.
pilot-fo-2: Loaʻa i ka hCaptcha nā hanana hoʻohui i kūkulu mua ʻia no nā ʻōnaehana mua a me hope āu e hoʻohana ai.
pilot-fo-3: Inā ʻoe e hele mai ana mai ka reCAPTCHA a Google, ʻo kā mākou mau API he mau pani pani. ʻEkolu laina o ke code wale nō āu e pono ai.
pilot-fo-4: Hiki i kā mākou mau ʻenekini hoʻokele ke hele wikiwiki iā ʻoe, inā ʻoe e pono i ka hoʻohui React, SDKs no nā polokalamu maoli ʻo iOS, kahi hiʻohiʻona Java backend, a i ʻole nā hiʻohiʻona ʻē aʻe.
pilot-fo-5: A e like me nā manawa a pau, he waiwai nui ka pilikino no mākou. Hoʻohui i kā mākou code hoʻokūkū wale nō ma kahi e pono ai, a ma kahi kūpono e pale aku ai iā ʻoe a me kāu mea hoʻohana. Hoʻomaka ka hōʻemi ʻana i ka hōʻiliʻili ʻikepili mai ka manawa o ka hoʻohui.
pilot-fdone: Mahalo. E pili koke ana mākou.

about-content-text-1b: Hōʻike mākou i nā pilikia CAPTCHA paʻakikī no nā bots akā maʻalahi no ka poʻe ma o ka hōʻiliʻili ʻana i nā ʻikepili paʻakikī i ka lepili mai nā pilikia aʻo ʻana i ka mīkini, a me ka hoʻohana ʻana e hoʻokaʻawale inā he kanaka a he malihini kipa pūnaewele paha.
about-content-text-2a: Hoʻonui pinepine ʻia nā mea hana ʻino ma ka pūnaewele. Akā ʻo ka mōhai ʻana i ka pilikino pilikino ʻaʻole ka pane.
about-content-text-2b: ʻO nā ʻōlelo palekana i hāʻawi ʻia e nā ʻoihana hoʻolaha e kia nui i ka huli ʻana i nā mea hoʻohana ma ka pūnaewele. Ua hana mākou i kahi hopena palekana kūpono e hōʻike ai i ka hōʻino ʻana i ka pilikino pilikino ʻaʻole pono e hāʻawi i nā hopena maikaʻi loa.

home-about-subtitle: Hoʻohana ʻia e ka Protocol HUMAN
home-about-text-1: Hoʻonohonoho ʻia ʻo hCaptcha e hoʻonā i ka pilikia nui o ka hana ma ke aʻo ʻana i ka mīkini: e lepili ʻana i nā nui o ka ʻikepili i kahi manawa kūpono, kūpono a hilinaʻi hoʻi.
home-about-text-2: ʻOi aku ka nui o ka ʻike i nā hopena maikaʻi aʻe i nā mīkini aʻo mīkini mīkini. ʻO ke kūleʻa hou o nā hiʻohiʻona hohonu i alakaʻi i ka nui o ka nui o nā hōkeo ʻikepili, kokoke mau me kekahi loiloi kanaka. Eia nō naʻe, ke lohi a me ke kumukūʻai hoʻi ka hoʻokumu ʻana i nā ʻikepili i ʻike ʻia e nā kānaka ma o ka Mechanical Turk, Figure Eight, a me nā mea ʻē aʻe.
home-about-text-3: Hāʻawi ʻo hCaptcha i nā pūnaewele e loaʻa kālā e lawelawe ana i kēia koi ʻoiai ke ālai ʻana i nā bot a me nā ʻano hana ʻino ʻē aʻe.
home-about-text-4: Hoʻohana ʻia ka mākeke hCaptcha e ka HUMAN Protocol, kahi protocol i wehe ʻia no ka loiloi kanaka e holo nei ma ka blockchain Ethereum. Loaʻa i nā pūnaewele i nā hōʻailona kanaka (HMT) ke hoʻohana nā mea hoʻohana i ka widget hCaptcha ma kā lākou pūnaewele, a uku nā ʻoihana aʻo mīkini i nā Token Kanaka e kiʻi i kā lākou ʻikepili.

labeling-features-text-2: Hoʻohana ka paepae HUMAN i nā hiʻohiʻona hilinaʻi piha e hana i ka loiloi maikaʻi maoli maoli. ʻAe kēia iā mākou e hoʻoholo wikiwiki i ka paʻakikī o nā nīnau a me kā lākou pane kūpono kūpono paha, e mālama ai i kou manawa a me kāu kālā.
labeling-features-text-3: ʻAʻole like nā pilikia āpau. ʻO nā Annotations no nā hana kūpilikiʻi e koi ai iā 99.99% hilinaʻi mai nā limahana kanaka āpau. ʻO nā Annotations no kahi hiʻohiʻona beta i kahi polokalamu pāʻani pūnaewele pono wale nō ka hilinaʻi kaulike. Hoʻoholo ʻoe.
labeling-features-text-4: Loaʻa iā ʻoe kahi ʻikepili maka me ka ʻole o kahi hoʻonohonoho hōʻoia holoʻokoʻa? I ka hapanui o nā hihia hiki iā mākou ke kūkulu i hoʻokahi no ʻoe ke holo nā hana ma o ka ʻōnaehana, a i ʻole hana i nā laʻana i kahakaha ʻia no kāu ʻae.

page-acc-faq-1: Nīnau: Ua kūpono anei ka hCaptcha Section 508 + WCAG 2.1 AA? Pane: Ke manaʻoʻiʻo nei mākou: hiki i nā mea hoʻohana āpau me nā ʻano kīnā ʻole ke nānā i ka pūnaewele a hoʻokomo i nā kikokikona ma nā palapala hiki ke komo i nā lawelawe i pale ʻia e hCaptcha ma ke kau inoa ʻana. Eia naʻe, ʻaʻole kēia he ʻōlelo aʻo kānāwai: pono ʻoe e hana i kāu loiloi ponoʻī, me ka noʻonoʻo ʻana i kāu hoʻokō ponoʻī e hōʻoia i kēia ka hihia no kāu kau ʻana.
page-acc-faq-2: Nīnau: Ke hana nei ʻoe i nā koho ʻē aʻe (a11y), e like me ka leo? Pane: ʻO nā koho kaulana mua e like me nā leo captchas e hoʻokae i nā mea hoʻohana a11y a hiki ke lanakila ʻia e nā ʻenehana aʻo mīkini hou. Ua hoʻoikaika kēia i nā pilikia leo o kēia manawa e lilo i mea paʻakikī, hoʻopuka i ka walaʻau, ka manawa ʻē, nā hui huaʻōlelo ʻokoʻa, a pēlā aku e lanakila ai i nā mea hoʻouka. No laila, ʻaʻole mākou i makemake nui i kēia ala me ka pale ʻana i ka pilikia, akā e noʻonoʻo mākou inā he koi mai ke kaiāulu a11y. Eia naʻe, makemake nui mākou i ka Privacy Pass no ka hihia hoʻohana Accessibility. Manaʻo mākou ʻo ka hoʻohui ʻana i kā mākou ala a11y i kēia manawa me ka hoʻopuka ʻana i ka Privacy Pass e ʻae i nā mea hoʻohana a11y e mākaʻikaʻi me ka palekana, paʻa i ka ʻike ʻoi aku ka pilikino o kā lākou kaʻa, ʻoiai ke kaohi ʻana i ka hoʻomāinoino ʻia e nā mea hana bot i hiki ʻole ke loaʻa ke loaʻa nā koho a11y. He poʻe paʻa mākou i ka pūʻulu hana IETF e hoʻohālikelike ana i kēia ʻenehana hou.
page-acc-faq-3: Nīnau: Pehea e pili ana i ka pilikino? Ke hōʻike nei ka hoʻopaʻa inoa ʻana i ka ʻikepili hulina a11y ma kekahi ala? He aha kāu e hana ai me ka leka uila? Pane: Hoʻolālā ʻia ka hCaptcha no ka pilikino mai ka honua. He ʻokoʻa loa ia ma mua o nā koho kuʻuna e like me reCAPTCHA nona nā pūnaewele hoʻolaha, nona ka manaʻo e hahai iā ʻoe a puni ka pūnaewele a hoʻopili iā ʻoe me kahi ʻike maoli. ʻAʻole mākou e hoʻohana i nā leka uila a i ʻole ka ʻike no kekahi kumu ʻē aʻe ma mua o ka hoʻohana ʻana a me ka pale ʻana i ka hana ʻino. Loaʻa i kā mākou kulekele pilikino nā pane ākea a mana e pili ana i ke ʻano o kā mākou hoʻohana ʻana i ka ʻikepili, akā ʻo ka pane pōkole ʻaʻole mākou makemake i ka hoʻopili ʻana iā ʻoe ma ke ʻano he kanaka me kāu mōʻaukala mākaʻikaʻi. ʻoiai e mālama mau ana i ko mākou hiki ke pale aku i ka hoʻomāinoino, e hoʻokō ana i kā mākou hana Privacy Pass.
page-acc-link-1: Inā ʻoe he hoʻohana maʻalahi, e ʻoluʻolu e kau inoa ma aneʻi.
page-acc-subhead: Ka hōʻoia ʻana i ke komo seamless no nā mea hoʻohana āpau me ka mālama ʻana i ka palekana
page-acc-summary-contents-1: Hoʻolālā ʻia ka hCaptcha e hoʻōki i nā bots ma ka hoʻokaʻawale ʻana iā lākou mai nā kānaka. ʻO nā hoʻokolohua ʻike he mea hana maʻalahi no kēia, akā ʻaʻole hiki i nā mea a pau ke hoʻoponopono i kahi pilikia ʻike. No kēia kumu, ua hoʻolālā mākou i kahi ʻokoʻa maʻalahi a ʻeha ʻole e ʻae i ka poʻe hoʻopuka e hoʻohana ana i kā mākou lawelawe e mālama i ka hiki no nā mea āpau me ka pauku 508 a me WCAG 2.1 AA hoʻokō.
page-acc-summary-contents-2: Pehea e hana ai: ʻo ka mea mua, hōʻailona ka mea hoʻohana maʻalahi i kēia URL, i hoʻopili ʻia ma ka ʻaoʻao info hCaptcha widget. Hāʻawi ʻia lākou i kahi kuki kuhi kuhi ʻia i hiki ke hoʻohana ʻia i nā manawa he nui i kēlā me kēia lā, akā pono e hōʻoluʻolu i kēlā me kēia 24 mau hola ma o ka ʻeʻe ʻana.
page-acc-tr-body:
Nīnau: Ke ʻike nei nō wau i kahi pilikia ma hope o ka hoʻonohonoho ʻana i ka kuki. He aha ke kumu o kēia?
Pane: Kuhi ʻia kēia ma muli o ka hoʻohana ʻana i kahi ad blocker a i ʻole anti-cookie extension, a i ʻole kahi hoʻonohonoho e ālai ana i nā kuki pūnaewele ākea, i kēia hihia kahi kuki no hcaptcha.com i hoʻonohonoho ʻia a nānā ʻia e ka hCaptcha JS ma kahi pūnaewele ʻokoʻa. , e like me kāu e kipa aku nei.

Hana nā kuki hiki ke kiʻi hCaptcha me nā polokalamu kele pūnaewele kaulana āpau a me nā blockers hoʻolaha me kā lākou hoʻonohonoho maʻamau, no laila maʻamau nā holomua ma muli o nā anti-anti-adblock scripts a i ʻole nā rula like e kuhikuhi ana i nā pūnaewele.

Pāʻoihana:

1. Whitelist hcaptcha.com a me * .hcaptcha.com kuki i kāu ad blocker a i ʻole ka loiloi palekana palekana.
2. Inā ʻoe e hoʻohana nei i ka polokalamu mākaʻikaʻi ʻo Brave, ka mea ʻaʻole i loaʻa i kēia manawa kekahi ʻano cookie whitelist, e hele i nā Prefers -> Shields -> nā kuki a koho i nā kuki āpau.
3. Inā ʻoe e hoʻohana nei i ka mana hou loa o Safari ma ka OS X 10.15 i hoʻokuʻu ʻia a i ʻole iOS 13.4 i kēia manawa, ua hoʻololi wale ʻo Apple i ke ʻano o Safari e pili ana i nā kuki ʻaoʻao ʻekolu, ka pale ʻana iā lākou āpau i ka paʻamau. Ke hoʻokō nei mākou i kahi hopena, akā i kēia manawa e ʻoluʻolu e kipa iā Safari Prefers, paukū pilikino, a me ka nānā ʻole i ka huli ʻana i ka pūnaewele: Pale i ka huli ʻana ma waena o ka pūnaewele i hiki ai i ka kuki komo ke hana e like me ka mea i manaʻo ʻia

Nīnau: Hoʻohana wau i nā hāmeʻa he nui. Pono wau e kau inoa i nā manawa he nui?
Pane: ʻAʻole. E kaomi i ka loulou leka uila like i hoʻouna ʻia iā ʻoe ma kēlā me kēia hāmeʻa āu e hoʻohana ai i mea e hoʻonohonoho ai i ka kuki.

Nīnau: Pehea e hiki ai iaʻu ke pale aku iaʻu iho mai ka ʻimi ʻana i ka kuki ʻaoʻao ʻekolu ʻoiai e hoʻohana ana i ka kuki komo?
Pane: Ke hoʻohana nei i kekahi pilikino a i ʻole hoʻolaha hoʻolaha e kākoʻo ana i ka whitelisting pae pae (e like me uBlock Origin) e hana e like me ka mea i manaʻo ʻia: e hōʻoia e whitelist hcaptcha.com.
page-acc-tr-title: No nā mea hoʻohana hiki ke komo: Nīnau pinepine a me ke alakaʻi hoʻoponopono
page-acc-tr2-body:
Safari
E hiki ai i nā kuki ma Safari (Mac): E hele i ka papa kuhikuhi iho o lalo o Safari. Koho i nā makemake. Kaomi aku i ka pilikino ma ka panela luna. Ma lalo o 'Block cookies' koho i ke koho 'Never.'
E hiki ai i nā kuki ma Safari (iPhone / iPad iOS 11+): E wehe i kāu hoʻonohonoho. Pepa i lalo a koho iā Safari. Ma lalo o ka pilikino a me ka palekana, e hoʻopau iā 'Prevent Cross-Site Tracking' a me 'Block All Cookies'

Firefox
Kaomi ma ka pale kaua i ka hema o ka helu wahi ma kahi pūnaewele. Kaomi aku i nā hoʻonohonoho pale. E wehe ʻia ka ʻaoʻao ʻo Firefox Prefers Privacy & Security. Ma lalo o ka pale ʻana i ka mālama pono ʻana, koho i ka Mana Lima. Koho i nā trackers a me nā script e keʻa ma ke koho ʻana i kēlā mau pahu pane. E nānā pono ua wehe ʻoe i ka hcaptcha.com.

Hiki iā ʻoe ke kāpae i kekahi manawa i kekahi mau pale ma Custom e debug i kēia, ma ke kāpae ʻana i nā pahuhoho: Hōʻalo i ka pahu huli nā Trackers a i ʻole wehe i ke koho ʻana i nā pahu Cookies inā e loaʻa mau ana nā pilikia.

ʻO Google Chrome
Google Chrome (PC)
Koho i ka ikona menu Chrome. Koho i nā koho.
E hele i ka pilikino a me ka palekana, a laila ʻo Kuki a me nā ʻikepili pūnaewele ʻē aʻe.
E nānā pono 'ālai' nā kuki ʻaoʻao ʻekolu '.

Google Chrome (Mac):
E wehe i nā koho Chrome mai ka papa kuhikuhi kahua paʻa.
E hele i ka pilikino a me ka palekana, a laila ʻo Kuki a me nā ʻikepili pūnaewele ʻē aʻe.
E nānā pono 'ālai' nā kuki ʻaoʻao ʻekolu '.

Google Chrome (Android):
Ma kāu polokalamu Android, wehe i ka polokalamu Chrome.
Ma ka ʻaoʻao ʻākau o luna, piula wai hou a laila hoʻonohonoho.
Piula i nā hoʻonohonoho pūnaewele a laila nā kuki.
Ma ka ʻaoʻao aʻe o 'Cookies,' e kuapo i ka hoʻonohonoho.
E hōʻoia i ka pahu ma hope o ka 'ʻae i nā kuki ʻaoʻao ʻekolu.'

Internet Explorer
1. Koho i nā kapa i ke kihi ʻākau ma luna o ka pale, a laila koho i 'nā koho Pūnaewele'. Inā loaʻa iā ʻoe ka papa ʻaina Menu, hiki iā ʻoe ke koho i nā 'Mea Hana' a laila 'Nā koho Pūnaewele'.
2. Kaomi i ka 'Privacy' tab.
3. Koho i ke pihi 'Pae holomua'.
4. Ma lalo o 'Kuki ʻaoʻao ʻekolu' koho 'ʻAe'.
5. Kaomi 'OK'

reporting-bugs-intro-head: Loaʻa i kahi kiki? Eia pehea e hōʻike ai.
reporting-bugs-intro-text: Hoʻohana nā miliona o ka poʻe i ka hCaptcha i kēlā me kēia mahina, ma nā kaukani o nā hui pūnaewele, nā mea hoʻolōʻihi, nā hāmeʻa, nā pale uila, a me nā mea hou aʻe. ʻO kā mākou pahuhopu e hōʻoia e hana mau ia nāu, no laila mahalo nui mākou i kāu hōʻike! E hāʻawi i nā pane wikiwiki, kaomi wale i ka pihi hoʻouna iā mākou. Inā ʻoe e ʻike nei i kahi pilikia hana, e ʻoluʻolu e hāhai i nā ʻōkuhi log debug no Chrome a i ʻole nā kuhikuhi log debug no Firefox ma lalo. No nā mea ʻimi pūnaewele ʻē aʻe e leka uila iā mākou. No nā pilikia palekana a pilikino paha e ʻike ai, e ʻike i nā ʻōkuhi ma lalo.

what-is-hcaptcha-text: Kōkua ʻo hCaptcha i kāu lawelawe pūnaewele punahele e kāpae i nā bot, spam, a me ka hoʻomāinoino e ka nīnau ʻana i nā nīnau maʻalahi maʻalahi no nā kānaka a paʻakikī hoʻi no nā mīkini.
why-hc-text: I kēlā me kēia manawa āu e pane ai i kahi pilikia, hoʻohana mākou i nā hiʻohiʻona laulā e ʻike ai inā he kanaka a mīkini paha ʻoe. ʻO ka pūnaewele āu i kipa ai a laila hoʻohana i kēia hopena e kōkua i ka hoʻomaikaʻi ʻana i kāu ʻike ma kā lākou pūnaewele ma ka mālama ʻana i nā bot.
